section_title: MAJOR ECONOMIES FORUM ON ENERGY AND CLIMATE:
sentences: The Eighth Meeting of the Leaders Representatives of the Major Economies Forum on Energy and Climate took place in New York, US, from 20-21 September 2010, and was attended by officials from 17 major economies, as well as the UN, Barbados, Denmark, Egypt, Singapore and Spain.
Participants discussed how to advance prospects for a successful outcome at the Cancun Climate Change Conference.
They recommended that the Tianjin negotiations should focus on key issues and extract from the negotiating text what should be decided upon in Cancun.
